text: Ani pratyeka janasamuhakarita amhi kurbanici eka pad'dhata niscita keli ahe, yasathi ki tyanni tya catuspada pasunvara allahace nava ghyave, je allahane tyanna pradana karuna thevale aheta. (Laksata ghya) tumha sarvanca kharakhura upasya (aradhya daivata) phakta ekaca ahe, tumhi tyacya adhina ani ajnadharaka vha, vinamrata angikaranaryanna khusakhabari dya
